segments.text: Hello , this is Garry Hao . I am calling to inquire the position of English interpreter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it is still open . Where did you graduate from .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I graduated from the Beijing Foreign Studies University . My major is English Translation and Interpretation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds great . I will arrange an interview tomorrow . Can you come tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I can . Thank you so much .
segments.speaker: S1
